title: Screen Recording Detected, DNS auto logs out
text: Hotstar needs to get their stuff together. You canâ€™t play anything while connected TV or monitor.  Netflix, HBO, even other local streaming works just fine. Why the uncessary security feature? Itâ€™s the same as disabling the audio when you use an earphone instead of the built-in speaker. Ridiculous! Plus you can easily circumvent this if logged in and playing via browser. This â€œfeatureâ€ needs to be removed immediately. Also, being connected to VPN or Private DNS automatically logs you out and deletes all your previously downloaded shows and movies. This is totally unecessary as well. If you want people not to use VPN or Private DNS while using the app you can simply warn them. Why forced logged out and removal of files?

title: Good but bad
text:
I started subscribing to Disney+ a month ago because I was interested in some of their content. I downloaded the app, subscribed through the application, and I have been surfing through their movies and TV shows ever since. Coming from using Netflix, I found some pros and cons pretty early on. 

Pros:
- Amazing, very wide, and world renowned content
- Much more affordable than their competition
- The application is quite intuitive
- Video resolution is top notch
- Love the way they group movies and tv shows on the bottom navigation bar
- Love how I can watch movies in portrait so I can scroll through other information beneath

Cons:
- No dark mode
- Canâ€™t set my age so I wouldnâ€™t have to press continue on every episode for series that has mature content
- After I leave the app mid-movie, it doesnâ€™t take much for it to reload the whole application, so I lose my movie progress
- Does not pick up where I left off, especially if I use multiple devices (i.e. iPhone and MacBook) so I am forced to scroll through the timeline to see where I last watched it
- If I leave portrait orientation lock to OFF, every time I watch in landscape mode and I play the next episode of a series that has mature content, the modal for me to continue glitches and I can not press on anything to continue
- No PIP in iPhone

So, overall Disney+ is great but the app is horrible. Little ways where it can help improve and smoothens customer journey were left out. At the end of the day, the cons outweighed the pros for me. So, after watching my favorite TV shows, Iâ€™m out unless the app gets fixed.

title: NEEDS MORE IMPROVEMENT, SEASONS AND BETTER TRANSLATION
text:
hdeh cape bgt sebenernya td udah nulis panjang lebar bgt tapi keapus karena kepencet cancel jadi harus nulis ulang ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ

1. NEEDS MORE IMPROVEMENT
gatau ini terjadi ke gue aja apa gmn, but this is really irritating. setiap kali gue mau nonton tv shows thumbnail/isi konten (episodenya) itu berceceran. so like contoh nih, mau nonton episode 3, tapi thumbnailnya itu dari episode 7, jadinya ga sesuai gituloh.
kalo ga gitu pasti episodenya yg berceceran, contoh : gue mau nonton episode 4. thumbnailnya bener, tapi isi kontennya (episodenya) itu dari episode 6. and itâ€™s really irritating sometimes karna kalo mau nonton ulang episodenya jadi bingung yg mana soalnya judul sama isi kontennya beda n berhamburan.

2. NEED MORE SEASONS AND EPISODES.
banyak tv show yg seasonnya belom lengkap. contohnya acara tv K.C UNDERCOVER, GIRL MEETS WORLD, JESSIE, dan A LOTTTTTTT more. k.c undercover originally had 3 seasons, tp di disney+ hotstar baru ada 1 season. so does jessie, gmw and other series. i know mungkin ini karna disney+ hotstar masih agak baru but i hope u guys can make it faster! ğŸ¤ğŸ’—

3. NEED A BETTER TRANSLATION / TRANSLATOR.
tbh i think this is also VERYY irritating. banyak kata2 yg salah di terjemahin. dan takutnya malah orang2 yg kurang ngerti bahasa inggris malah bingung soalnya yg diterjemahin sama yg diomongin n alur ceritanya jAuh buAngEttt. and thatâ€™s not really cool:/ once ada episode di tv show â€œJESSIEâ€ dari s1 yg bener2 ngaco translationnya, and of course this does not apply to every words but still is a bit of a problem.

well after all i still love disney+ hotstar, but i think it just need some improvements and more episodes! but i think itâ€™s fine since ini juga belom lama banget dirilis apknya. so yeahh i think thatâ€™s all for today! much love and goodluck! ğŸ’—ğŸ’—
